00030 //a few defines which make calculations easier....
00031 #define CLOCK_SPEED      (uint32_t)7372800
00032 #define CLOCK_SPEED_0    CLOCK_SPEED //no prescaling
00033 #define CLOCK_SPEED_8    (CLOCK_SPEED /    (uint32_t)8)
00034 #define CLOCK_SPEED_32   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)32)
00035 #define CLOCK_SPEED_64   (CLOCK_SPEED /   (uint32_t)64)
00036 #define CLOCK_SPEED_128  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)128)
00037 #define CLOCK_SPEED_256  (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)256)
00038 #define CLOCK_SPEED_1024 (CLOCK_SPEED /  (uint32_t)1024)
00039 
00040 #define EXT_CLOCK      32768
00041 #define EXT_CLOCK_0    EXT_CLOCK //no prescaling
00042 #define EXT_CLOCK_8    (EXT_CLOCK /    8)
00043 #define EXT_CLOCK_32   (EXT_CLOCK /   32)
00044 #define EXT_CLOCK_64   (EXT_CLOCK /   64)
00045 #define EXT_CLOCK_128  (EXT_CLOCK /  128)
00046 #define EXT_CLOCK_256  (EXT_CLOCK /  256)
00047 #define EXT_CLOCK_1024 (EXT_CLOCK / 1024)
